items.title: Gardening:  The Basics of Saving Seeds from your Garden
items.headline: Never buy a garden seed again by learning how to save your own seeds from your vegetable garden
objectives_summary: You will learn what heirloom seeds (open pollinated) are and what hybrid sees are and why you can't save seeds from hybrids
Cross pollination can have a big affect on some seeds, you will learn what plants have cross pollination issues and how to prevent problems with your seeds.
Some plants are easy to save seeds from, others are very difficult.  You will and gain the skills you need to start saving your own garden seeds

items.title: Compost 101
items.headline: Learn to make your own quality Compost, customize your Compost output, and as the key ingredient for Compost Tea
objectives_summary: You will learn to make your own quality Compost, including customising your Compost output for specific types of plants, and, as the key ingredient for Aerated Compost Tea
Some of the fascinating stuff that goes on below our feet, in the soil, and in your Compost pile.
Compost
